channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260126.2)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add keystroke sequence tracking and AX-based buffer verification

  • TypingBuffer: Add keystrokeSequence to track exact typing order for word break restore
  • VNEngine: Add verifyBufferMatchesScreen() to detect buffer-screen desync via Accessibility API
  • VNEngine: Add focusChangedDuringTyping flag to track when focus shifts during typing
  • CharacterInjector: Add getLastWordCallback for AX-based screen content verification
  • Skip restore operations when AX detects buffer doesn't match screen content
  • Add comprehensive unit tests for keystroke sequence tracking
  • Bump build to 20260126.2

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
